info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 11 at 12:04PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Snowfall intensity increasing through early this afternoon... Across the Mohawk Valley, Schoharie County, Capital and Saratoga region, the Lake George area, Berkshires and southwest Vermont, snow will continue to become steadier and increase in intensity over the next few hours. Snowfall rates may reach between one half and three quarters of an inch per hour by early afternoon in this area. This will increase the potential for hazardous travel conditions through early this afternoon, including snow covered roadways and poor visibilities. Motorists are urged to use extra caution if traveling over the next few hours, as snowfall intensity increases.
